Description: Upper section of a glazed composition shabti with painted detail: a white and brown striated lappet-wig, a red modelled face with black features, a brown collar, a white body, crossed red hands in relief holding a brown painted djed-column and an ankh-sceptre, the back is decorated with a representation of a brown seed-basket and a yoke with pendular nw-pots, the leg section has broken away.
